review: I have never written a review before, but always read them to make a purchase.If you are a amazon prime member, then this is the best money spent to watch movies, catch up on TV shows with ease, also best way to surf YOUTUBE in full screen. Most of movies and TV shows are free with prime, but new releases are charged a small fee. Amazon will double confirm before purchase is made that no accidental billing.. TV shows that have seasons active still on live TV have option to buy episode or whole season.Its great if you missed an episode of your favorite  TV show. NO commercials, Love it. Past seasons of your favorite shows usually are free.Best money spent for entertainment
